channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ramaswamy launches Trump-inspired bid for Ohio governor, vows 'hard change,' 'commonsense' reform

item.title: Leftist Political Theater Is Back At GOP Town Hall Meetings In Trump 2.0

item.title: Exclusive: Jordan Subpoenas FBI For Weaponization Docs Hidden By Biden

item.title: Deadline for Musk's ultimatum to federal workers hits, but consequences remain vague
item.description: Billionaire Elon Musk says federal employees will get a second chance to respond to work accountability requests after Monday night's deadline passed.

item.title: MI Elections Dept. ‘Does Not Possess’ Record Of Student ID Voters After A Noncitizen Allegedly Used One To Vote
item.description: Michigan's election chief says detecting noncitizen voters is 'very easy.' But Ann Arbor's clerk charges four figures to search for them.

item.title: CNN: Deep State Bureaucrats Threaten To Sell State Secrets If Trump Isn’t Nice To Them
item.description: CNN warns that intelligence employees who get the axe are valuable — and that those same employees will sell national secrets if fired. Which is it?

item.title: Senate Majority Leader John Thune Riding High, for Now, Amid Cabinet Confirmation Spree
